appetizers.name: Chips and Dip
appetizers.description: Extra-thin authentic corn tostada chips made fresh daily. Served with freshly made salsa.

appetizers.name: Cheese Bread
appetizers.description: Cheese and bread. It’s obviously the greatest loaf of all time.

appetizers.name: Salad
appetizers.description: A tasty classic salad with a side of ranch dressing.

cold sandwiches.name: Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: The owners favorite. Delcious thin sliced turkey along side your choice of cheese.

cold sandwiches.name: Ham
cold sandwiches.description: The owners other favorite. Delcious thin sliced ham along side your choice of cheese.

hot sandwiches.name: Grilled Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: Two slices of toasted bread covering your choice of delicious cheese.

hot sandwiches.name: Philly Cheesesteak
hot sandwiches.description: Our number one voted dish. It doesn't get better than this.

deserts.name: Ice Cream
deserts.description: A tasty sweet chilled classic. With choices of chocolate, vanilla, or mixed.

deserts.name: Pie
deserts.description: A warm baked treat that will have your mouth watering for more. We've got apple, pumpkin, and key-lime pie

drinks.name: Mountain Dew
drinks.description: Mountain Dew, the original instigator, refreshes with its one of a kind great taste.

drinks.name: Dr. Pepper
drinks.description: As authentic as a vintage 'I'm a Pepper®' tee, Dr Pepper is always original. A signature blend of 23 flavors makes every sip of Dr Pepper truly unique. There's nothing like a Dr Pepper.
